name: Repomaster
body:
### Welcome to RepoMaster.

RepoMaster is a generic repository pattern implementation for .Net. The library currently only has an Entity Framework Code first implementation.

A sample implementation can be found here https://github.com/wlandeck/GenericRepositoryExample
This sample will be expanded on to illustrate the capabilities.

More documentation to follow soon
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
